about_the_game:
Frutakia is back and better than ever! 4K@120FPS.
Match 3 or more fruits and level up! Go ahead and move any row up or down! We dare you to discover its ultra-addictive gameplay, play once and that’s it... Simple and smart gameplay, ideal for short periods of time.

GAME OBJECTIVE:
You must make clever groups of 3 or more cascade lines with the same fruits in any direction! Move the fruits up or down or press the lever and spin them all.

WATCH OUT:
Every time you move a fruit your life bar drops, and every time you match fruits your bar rises. If your life bar empties, you lose. If it fills all the way to the top, you get a level up and play with new and more valuable fruits. Simple but super addictive! Also, try to match multiple fruits at the same time.

MODES:
Easy: Take your time and have fun.
Hard: For those who like frantic fun!

Features:
  • 4K@120FPS Remaster!
  • Super addictive: play once and that’s it...
  • Very fast gameplay (a game can last a mere 10 seconds).
  • Trophies to complete.
  • Simple but smart gameplay.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed

name: Frutakia 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed

reviews:
“The game looks simple but I ensure you that if you give it a try you will end up playing multiple hours. I played so much that I kept on matching fruits in my brain even after 4 hours of gameplay...”
5/5 – Phonesnews
short_description: Frutakia is back and better than ever! 4K@120FPS.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
